author: brent.allsop
content:
There were two decisions in the recent EIP IP meeting:
DECISION 23.1: If you move things to Final, there's not a requirement for the yellow paper to be updated see
DECISION 23.1: Plan to have someone update the yellow paper or to make another source of truth in bulk in the new year. see


I’ve included the Yellow paper as one of the sources of EIP information in the just started “EIP Single Source Cleanup” google doc.  I’ve also added this:

A comment needs to be added to the yellow paper indicating that this human readable Yellow Paper is only up to date with the canonical Eth 1.0 specs, to the degree that contributors keep it up to date.  It is rarely completely up to date.
